Caption: Dr. A. L. Mudaliar addresses the audience
Description: Dr. A. L. Mudaliar talked about the accomplishments that IIT Madras was able to achieve including the status it earned as an 'Institution of National Importance' under an Act of Parliament passed in1961. He also thanked the Federal Republic of Germany, the Government of India and the Government of Madras for their co-operation. He mentioned "We deem this institution as one of the most important and fruitful of the Indo-German Projects in this country."
